definition: (music) loud, used as a direction in music, used chiefly as a direction or description in music
details:
noun
- (music) loud
= synonyms: fortissimo
- an asset of special worth or utility
= example: an asset of special worth or utility
= synonyms: specialty
- the stronger part of a sword blade between the hilt and the foible
adverb
- used as a direction in music
= synonyms: loudly
adjective
- used chiefly as a direction or description in music
= example: used chiefly as a direction or description in music
= synonyms: loud
